comment: She is literally the sweetest woman ever. She allows 3 absences, and she works with you when it comes to late work. I know this was helpful for many students. She always gave helpful feedback on rough drafts, and she overall just has a bubbly personality (but not overly). This class is a great intro into the college world of essays.
Prof. Reidy was awesome!! she takes the time to talk to each student and makes sure you are doing well in her class. papers were always enjoyable in her class!
Absolutely amazing!
very understanding when it comes to missing class, made the class very enjoyable!

Professor has to be the most helpful instructor to exist! I will say that even though she gives grace periods, do not let it go to your head; there is still an essay due. If a rough draft is needed to turn in, I advise you to submit it even if it is only two paragraphs. She always gives feedback on a pdf to let you know where to improve.

Pretty easy class as long as you read the material before hand which usually isn't to long. You can always ask her to read through your essays before she grades them. If you are absent when homework is due you have to send her a picture or else she will take off points for each day missed. She is super sweet and helpful. Just be a good student!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--So many papers

comment: Professor Reidy was easily the best professor I have ever had. I had to retake this class after receiving a D in the previous one. I finished the second time with a high A. She makes learning enjoyable and is very helpful. I wish she taught 1102, I would take her class again without a doubt.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: My favorite professor at Highlands BY FAR!! She is so awesome and cares about her students. I actually liked attending her classes and miss her English 1101 class. She grades respectfully and I passed with an A. I absolutely would take her course again.

I took Prof. Reidy class this pass spring, as a freshman. I really enjoyed her class, the context was very clear and she was very approachable. I had struggled with several unexpected life events which caused me to miss out on a month worth of work but Prof. Reidy worked with me to make up missed work and she was passionate about helping me.

The best teacher i had in my college studies thus far. Creative assignments that are the perfect blend of not too boring and not too overwhelming. Very clear instructions and i actually can say i am a better academic writer due to her class. Definitely recommend taking. Would take her again in a heartbeat if i could.

She makes this course  so understandable and easy. Gives 4 papers and gives opportunities to bring each grade up afterwards. Gives a lot of grades so more chances to improve. Final paper is a group project
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Overall a fun and engaging class with lots of group work and discussion. Pretty easy A, but I did not feel like class time was used well at times, with classes often turning into long discussions and debates off tangents which more focused on the content of pieces instead of how they were written. Overall I enjoyed it though
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Reidy was genuinely the best professor I could've gotten my very first semester. She is super caring and takes every students opinion into consideration when lecturing. Also, she's a very forgiving and easy grader. DEFINITELY take her!

AMAZING!!! Hands down best professor out there. If you struggle with English and are scared of the possibility of college English, take her. She is a genuinely nice person who always takes to time work with you. Easy grader and actually makes you a much better writer in the process. Would take again a million times over.

I loved having her class. I'm not a fantastic writer, and she was not super harsh with me and was very understanding and cool about it. If you need help, she really has no issue helping out and letting you know what you're doing right/wrong. While she does give homework, it's nothing impossible and she always gives a lot of time to write papers!

Reidy has been an INCREDIBLE English professor. I genuinely enjoy going to class--even though it's an almost 3-hour-long class, she makes it enjoyable! She's SO sweet and gives great feedback. Very encouraging and gives clear guidelines for the essays. Class is mandatory. Some homework and a few blog posts, but basically graded for completion.

Professor Reidy is one of my favorite professors! I always sucked at English but she makes it way more interesting and applicable towards life. She assigns 4 easy essays and small, easy homework assignments all throughout the semester which makes it much easier for me to learn composition.
I'm not an English person and she made English more interesting. I learned more in her English class than I did in all four years of high school. Great personality and great professor!

LOVE HER. Professor Reidy is a very approachable, understanding woman who is there to help you succeed. She grades essays in a timely manor and always gives feedback. Gives extra credit to go to the writing center. I wish she taught upper division English because I would take her again in a heartbeat.

Best teacher that I have ever had at KSU by far! You can tell that she is very passionate about what she does. She keeps the class interesting and she keeps the students engaged. I wish I could take her again in my next english class!
Very good professor. Clear cut information, follow the syllabus and course schedule, come to class, write decent papers, and you will receive an A.
Easy A! so helpful when it comes to writing papers and anything to do with this class! Just show up and put your thoughts on the piece of paper that makes sense and you'll get an A!

Ms. Reidy is hands down the best professor I have ever taken, possibly my favorite teacher at any level honestly. Genuinely nice person who is always available for help . Grade consists mainly of 4 papers which are not tough if you just do the work. Would take again a million times.

She was great for my English 1101 class, I wanted to take her again for English 1102, but it didn't work out. I highly recommend her. She doesn't ask for much, is very chill, but doesn't let you slack off at the same time. She was great, I really liked her.

Ms. Reidy is the best professor I have ever had. She is very clear on assignments and what is expected for papers. If you give effort and show that you care, you will do exceptional in this class. I would recommend any and all students to take her for English. She is very approachable and knows what she's talking about. I love her!
She is amazing with feedback. And only four papers with the longest being only four pages. Gives lots of daily grades that help cushion your grade. Gives very detailed instructions for papers

Ms. Reidy was great! I took her Spring of 2015 and her feedback really did make my writing better and taught me how to polish my writing.  She only have 4 essays through the semester, but she makes you work for a good grade.  She is very interested in her students' passions and wants to see them succeed.  Don't come to class unprepared.

She's fantastic! Very clear in what you need to do and when you need to do it- the clearest of any of my professors this year. Not exactly bubbly but she's cheerful. Gave our class two extra points on each of our papers if we visited the school's writing lab. Doesn't fuss at students. Take her if you can, but don't slack on your essay quality.
Great teacher, really helpful.
I thought she was a tough grader.  Not as easy as some people say.  I got all B's on my papers.  Tons of essays to write.  I would take someone else.

She's passionate about the subject and legitimately wants her students to get better at writing.  The books are very interesting as are the class discussions. This is a good class for anybody, regardless of writing skill.

I love Ms. Reidy! She does give work, but it's easy (can be done in 15 minutes). She doesn't give a midterm or final, but there are 4 essays throughout the semester. They all build on each other. She's definitely not boring in class - I had her for a 3 hour class and it felt like a 30 minute class. She's funny and her class is one of the best!
Great Instructor! Very helpful and class is a lot of class participation which makes it an enjoyable class. Very approachable and has good comments in grading not just bad. Best class so far!

She is always very clear on her essay assignments and what she is looking for. Lots of easy homework grades and in class assignments to help boost your grade. I'm not the best writer but she is not a strict grader so I have made A's on all of my papers. Great professor, I wish I could take her again. Highly recommend.

Took 1102 with her. Wasnt a bad class, but im not a fan of english classes. Had to constantly do daily readings from at least one of the textbooks, which for the most part are rather dull. She gives great feedback on her papers and does a pretty good job in lecture. Id recommend her to just about anyone. Especially those who are not lit majors.

Ms. Reidy is the BEST. I took her for my freshman english class and I think I learned more in that one semester than I did in all my english classes in highschool. My writing has improved immensely and I actually feel comfortable writing papers now. She is beyond helpful and is a very pleasant person. I wish she could teach all my english classes.
Just TAKE her

Professor Reidy is my all time favorite teacher. She is beyond helpful and so sweet. She has a very funny way to all of her lectures and it makes it much more enjoyable. I never thought I was a good writer until her class. She helped me become the writer I am today! I definitely recommend her, she's awesome!
Pretty easy

Professor Reidy is probably the best English teacher out there! She is young and in graduate school so she understands how we think and tries to make her teaching to stuff that is interesting! Most of the class time is class discussion so it isn't boring! 5 papers and all are straight forward! Lots of ways to earn extra points on final paper

I went into this class thinking about how different college level English would be different. And it was but she also gave my so many pointers that helped even in my 1102 class. Always go to the writing lab before. I made a 99, 97, and 96 on the first three papers. Which made me very confident in my writing ability.

She is literally the most amazing instructor that I have ever had in my entire schooling career. Class is only mandatory cause of the English Department's policy, so go to class. Get the textbooks, they're actually interesting to read and you will use them a lot. She is super easy-going, and fun to learn from. You'll miss out if you don't take her!

She's chill and nice. You have to come to class. For essays, just write what she wants. don't be creative. she wants the format and stuff how she wants it. If its not on the assignment sheet, she doesn't want it! Nice AND SUPER CHILL!!! Take her!! Do the readings and dicuss in class and you'll be fine.

Take her, no doubt about it. She is really cool. No tests, just essays. You never have to read either, she assigns DOES readings... but you only talk about them and you can just sit and listen. Attendance is mandatory, unfortunately, but that's okay .. She is fun to listen to cause she can be rather humorous.

Ms. Reidy is a grad student, she is really young, but that is what makes her great. She is very nice and very helpful. She is always willing to stay after to help with your papers, which there are 4 of. They aren't that bad, about 4-5 pages, you choose what you write about according to what style paper she wants. Amazing teacher in all, love her.

This woman is super nice, and she is young and super bubbly. She loves English and is super passionate. You do have to come to class, but it isn't even bad to sit there and listen. There are 4 papers and blog posts (VERY EASY), the previous author was right... you choose your own topics, which is awesome. I am definitely taking her for 1102.

Ms. Reidy is super nice and very helpful. There are no tests, and she just expects you to write 4 papers and post a few blogs. For the papers, you really get to choose what you write about.So, it is not bad at all. Attendance is basically mandatory cause you can only have 3 absences. Other than that, she is awesome. She tries to be funny too.
